body: @makago I've asked the author Directly and he said that there is nothing like revenge gonna be there but her son is gonna become a chad later and probably have a series

Pls I beg you make a end who the mom regret everything. Because her guy (I think his name is Ueno) goes to work for a long time, she sees that she cheated on her own son. She realizes that she doesn't love Ueno, she loves sex. She hates herself for it and wants to go back to Ken. I want to see the guy suffer. Make pls a good ending for ken to...

So the kid never came back huh? Well, at least he finally let go of it, it's a happy ending in the end. They have a family and our boy is probably living his life while protecting his mother's happiness
